full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI MTSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON BZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS GYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYIG GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES BA SHING MO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGAS BGYIS SO,, ,,)
